args:
Shingen, leader of the Tiger Wyrmclan, is met
with suspicion when he arrives to deliver yearly
blessings—and when the Monkey clan's leader
also arrives, chaos ensues! Just when things
begin to clear up, the dead appear and a boy
named Izumo issues a dire warning.
Your servant Izumo stands ready,\nLady Amaterasu.
My apologies for the sudden summons.
Not at all. I am My Lady's emissary;\nspreading your word to the people\nis my sacred task and purpose.
But you spoke of a pressing matter.\nHas something happened?
Indeed. Hinomoto—nay, the world!—\nlies in the shadow of encroaching danger.\nHear me well...
Heh heh heh.. Ooooh ho ho ho!
This is usually the time of year when the\nWyrmclans pay their visit, but...
But this year, we'll not blindly trust any\nwho turn up claiming to be them.
Not after blithely inviting the enemy into\nour home last year! That was a headache\nI'll care not to repeat, thank you.
Just thinking back to it makes my blood\nboil. This year, we'll make sure they're\nlegit, no matter what it takes!
Look lively, people! We got company!
Finally here, eh? All right,\n{player_name}, you go greet 'em\nwhile we look on from the shadows.
I am Shingen of the Tiger Wyrmclan,\nand I come from Hinomoto bearing the\nblessings of the new year.
And I am his pactbound dragon,\nFudo Myo-o.
We've been waiting for you. Thank you\nfor making the long trek to our home.
All right, so how do we test if these\nfolks are the real deal or not?
Well, since Wyrmclan leaders are known\nfor their shapeshifting, a sure way would\nbe to see him turn into his dragon.
So we just have to make him transform?\nEasy-peasy! Leave it to me.
I'd heard tale of the Halidom's grandeur,\nbut it truly is a marvel to behold. A castle\nthis large must hold a force of hundreds!
Yeeeah, uh, something like that.\nI fear our exact numbers are, um...
Surely the lord of this castle knows\nthe number of his own men?

Ah! No! I only mean that...ummm...
we've had a recent wave of new recruits
and the count's been all over the place as
a result. Yeah, that's it...
Oh ho! A glut of citizens enlisting to fight\nis the mark of a well-loved land high in\nmorale. This is a fine thing to see.
(Phew! Lying is a lot harder than I gave it\ncredit for. Still, I can't let anything slip\nin case this guy isn't who he claims to be.)
Alert! Alert! We're under attack!\nAnd they're super strong, so we need all\nshapeshifters on deck, pronto!
Pssst! Luca! Don't you think you're going\na little overboard here?!
What foe dares?! Leave this to me,\nPrince {player_name}. Graaagh!
Okay, he cleared all that smoke with one\nwave of his fan? Just how freakishly\nstrong IS this guy...?
You there! Knave! You would dare\nseek harm to Lord Shingen?
Your crimes shall not be forgiven.
Mmm? That was Fudo Myo-o's power...\nShe must have identified the perpetrator of\nthis fell attack!
Wait, no! You don't understand what...\nOkay, forget seeing if this guy is the real\ndeal or not—I need to go stop a murder!
Face my judgment! Face it! Face it!\nFAAAAACE IIIIIIT!
I'm sorry! I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry,\nI'M RUNNING AWAAAAAAAAAY!
Surrender, villain! I got no idea what you\ndid, but I'm sure it was totally evil!
Because following in your footsteps is my\nsingular purpose, so that's exactly what\nI did!
Why does this always happen to meee...?
I believe that man yonder is your enemy,\nPrince {player_name}. Er, right?
I think we owe you an explanation—\nand an apology.
...So that's why we wanted to verify your\nidentities. But it all clearly went sideways,\nso I can only ask you to forgive us.
Not at all! A lord protecting his holdfast\nis as natural as the sun's rising. And if it\nwill allay your fears...
I shall gladly become one with Lord\nShingen anytime and anywhere.\nHeh heh heh...
Will this serve as proof, Your Highness?

Absolutely. Thank you for indulging us,
and allow me to welcome you once more,
Shingen, Fudo Myo-o, and...um...
Sorry, who are you again?
That one is my disciple—one I THOUGHT\nI left at home. ...Greet the people, Yuki.
HEY THERE, PEEPS! I'm Yukimura, leader\nof the Monkey Wyrmclan and future leader\nof the Tiger Wyrmclan! ...Er, hopefully.
Wait, hold on. You lead the Monkey clan,\nbut you also want to lead the Tiger clan?
Yep! I wanna be just like General Shingen.\nOr more specifically, I want to BE him!
So I'm gonna become the Tiger clan head!\nI already sorta became the Monkey leader,\nI guess, so, uh...I'll try to do that too!
You ＂sorta＂ became leader of a Wyrmclan?\nI am not following this at all.
Okay, so that's a looooong story...\nbut I guess we got the time!
SO! One day, some government types\ncame around and asked me to become\nsome kinda Wyrmclan leader dealie!
And I'm thinking, ＂Hang on, that's what the\nGeneral is!＂ So I figure I can succeed him,\nyeah?! But then I form the pact and...
And suddenly I'm like the Monkey clan\nleader or something? Weird, right?
Whew! That explanation took FOREVER!\nI'm totally exhausted from all the words.
Time for some refreshing push-ups!\nOne! Two! Three!
So, uh, does that mean she forged a\nsoulpact without bothering to know the\ndifference between Monkey and Tiger?
I mean this in the nicest way possible,\nbut is this lady a total idiot?
We don't call people idiots, Luca—\neven when we believe them to be idiots\nin our hearts.
HEY! WHO'S CALLIN' ME AN IDIOT?!
Hmm? You must be imagining things.
Really? WHEW! That's good to know!
AAAAANYWAY, that's how I became head\nof the Monkey Wyrmclan—but I'm still\ngonna be the general one day!
See, my goal is to become leader of the\nTiger Wyrmclan, so I just gotta convince\nhim to name me as his successor.
Then, boom! DOUBLE soulpact!\nLook forward to working with ya, FuMyo!
This is precisely why I told you to stay\nhome. How am I supposed to perform\nmy duties amidst all of this chaos?

Well, whatever's happening here, we're
happy to welcome each and all of you to
what is clearly going to be a VERY lively
year-end celebration.
Now let me give you a tour of the castle\nto help make up for our earlier—
Everybody to the top of the castle walls!\nYou gotta see this!
We got more guests outside the gates,\nand you're never gonna believe who it is!
Uh, but King Aurelius is dead, right?\nSo how the heck is he here?
Mym, look there! At the king's side!
Myriam? But you've been dead\nfor over 300 years!
Of course, Myriam!\nI'll be right there to—
You must not open the gates!
They are the dead returned, and they mean\nto drag you all to the Realm of the Dead!
I, uh, do not understand any of that.\nAlso, who the heck are you?!
Welcome, Izumo. It must be quite the\npressing task indeed if it brings you here\nby way of emergency teleportation.
I fear the blessing of the new year must\nwait—the two of you are to return to\nHinomoto at once.
Hurry, Cleo... Hurry, Brunhilda...\nHurry and let us in...
This is the same deathly fog from when\nthe castle was overrun last year.
It is mana from the Realm of the Dead!
Both Hinomoto and the entire world will\nsoon become a land of death forever!
